PPLoc: Employees: http://myturner.turner.com/compliance_sbc; vendors, suppliers, business customers and business contacts: http://www.turner.com/#/safe-harbor-privacy-policy
activities:
Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. may collect and use Personal Data from its past, present and prospective 

(A) employees and their beneficiaries, dependents and emergency contacts, contractors, consultants and other individuals who provide services to Turner or its affiliates and subsidiaries, for purposes which include:

Human resources functions, including but not limited to onboarding, training, career and succession planning, administering employee contracts, employee evaluations and surveys, implementing employee-related actions and obligations, budgeting and forecasting, administering payroll, bonus and benefits, and related information; human capital management and reporting; recruitment and hiring activities; business continuity and disaster recovery; employee directories, email system and archiving solutions, information technology support and services; events planning, expense and business  travel management; and security, health and safety, legal and regulatory compliance reporting, auditing and management, including but not limited to, in connection with legal process or litigation, and for investigative and disciplinary purposes;

and

(B) vendors, suppliers, business customers and business contacts of Turner and its affiliates or subsidiaries, for purposes which include:

Contact information directories; email system and archiving solutions; IT support and services; management of Turner’s supply chain and distribution channels; business administration and accounting activities; contract administration; reporting, forecasting, invoice generation and financial reconciliation; and security, health and safety, legal and regulatory compliance reporting, auditing and management, including but not limited to, in connection with legal process or litigation, and for investigative and disciplinary purposes.
contactoff1: Turner Legal Department – Safe Harbor Program
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President and General Counsel
eucountries: Denmark, France, Germany, Hungary, Iceland, Italy, Norway, Poland, Romania, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization data and vendor, supplier, business customer and business contact information.  Yes, the data covered includes manually processed data.
